languages.text: "Тебе не сбить меня с истинного пути! Дети, я спасу вас!"

traits.locale_text: "Тебе не сбить меня с истинного пути! Умри!"

languages.text: "You will not lead me astray from the true path! I will save you, my children!"
languages.original_text: "Тебе не сбить меня с истинного пути! Дети, я спасу вас!"

traits.locale_text: "You will not lead me astray from the true path! I will save you, my children!"
"You will not lead me astray from the true path! I will save you, my children!"

"You will not lead me astray from the true path! I will save you, my children!"
"You will not lead me astray from the true path! I will save you, my children!"

languages.text: "Ihr werdet mich nicht vom wahren Pfad abbringen! Ich werde euch retten, meine Kinder!"
languages.original_text: "You will not lead me astray from the true path! I will save you, my children!"

traits.locale_text: "Ihr werdet mich nicht vom wahren Pfad abbringen! Ich werde euch retten, meine Kinder!"

languages.text: « Vous ne me détournerez pas du vrai chemin ! Je vous sauverai, mes enfants ! »
languages.original_text: "You will not lead me astray from the true path! I will save you, my children!"

traits.locale_text: « Vous ne me détournerez pas du vrai chemin ! Je vous sauverai, mes enfants ! »

languages.text: “你休想让我偏离正道！孩子们，我会拯救你们！”
languages.original_text: "You will not lead me astray from the true path! I will save you, my children!"

traits.locale_text: “你休想让我偏离正道！孩子们，我会拯救你们！”

languages.text: 「お前たちは、私を真の道から迷わせはしない！私は、お前たちを救ってみせる…私の子供たちよ！」
languages.original_text: "You will not lead me astray from the true path! I will save you, my children!"

traits.locale_text: 「お前たちは、私を真の道から迷わせはしない！私は、お前たちを救ってみせる…私の子供たちよ！」

languages.text: «¡No me apartarás del verdadero camino! ¡Os salvaré, hijos míos!».
languages.original_text: "You will not lead me astray from the true path! I will save you, my children!"

traits.locale_text: «¡No me apartarás del verdadero camino! ¡Os salvaré, hijos míos!».

languages.text: "Beni doğru yoldan saptıramazsın! Sizi bırakmayacağım evlatlarım!"
languages.original_text: "You will not lead me astray from the true path! I will save you, my children!"

traits.locale_text: "Beni doğru yoldan saptıramazsın! Sizi bırakmayacağım evlatlarım!"
